radio.label: Location
radio.title: Sample Source (web) / Location (web to clt)

text.label: LocationCode
text.title: This is used to assign each location's unique identifying code from the Location question row label. Do not edit.

html.label: Intro
html.p:
Hello and welcome to our survey!
Thank you in advance for your participation. This study is very important to us and we ask that you answer each question carefully and completely.
While going through the survey, please use the scroll bar on the right and bottom of your screen to move up and down through questions and images. Please remember that there are no right or wrong answers. We are only interested in your opinions.
Thank you again! Let’s begin…

checkbox.label: S_PastParticipation
checkbox.title: Have you participated in a market research study within the past month, on any of the following topics?
checkbox.row: Household cleaning products like laundry detergent
Personal care products like soap or shampoo
Frozen treats like ice cream or popsicles

checkbox.label: S_Industry
checkbox.title: Do you, your friends or anyone in your family, work for any of the following industries?
checkbox.row: Advertising agency or public relations firms
A graphic design or packaging firm
A company involved in the manufacturing, distribution, or sale of household cleaning products like laundry detergent products
A company involved in the manufacturing, distribution, or sale of cookies or crackers products
A company involved in the manufacturing, distribution, or sale of personal care products like soap or shampoo products

term.cond: (S_Industry.r1 or S_Industry.r2 or S_Industry.r3 or S_Industry.r6)

select.label: S_GroceryShop
select.title: How much of the household’s personal care shopping (i.e., soap, oral care, hair products, etc.) do you, yourself, do?

radio.label: S_Gender
radio.title: With which gender do you identify most?

term.cond: S_Gender.r1 or S_Gender.r3 or S_Gender.r4 or S_Gender.r5 or S_Gender.r6 or S_Gender.r7

number.label: S_Age
number.title: Please type in your age below.

checkbox.label: S_Frequency
checkbox.title: Which of the following types of products, if any, have you personally purchased in the past 6 months?

checkbox.label: S_BrandAwareness
checkbox.title: Which of the following Body wash brands have you ever seen or heard of?

term.cond: not(S_BrandAwareness.r4 and S_BrandAwareness.r5 and S_BrandAwareness.r17 and S_BrandAwareness.r19)

checkbox.label: S_Brand_P6M
checkbox.title: Which brand or brands of Body wash, have you purchased and used in the past 6 months?

term.cond: not(S_Brand_P6M.r1 or S_Brand_P6M.r3 or S_Brand_P6M.r4 or S_Brand_P6M.r5 or S_Brand_P6M.r7 or S_Brand_P6M.r10 or S_Brand_P6M.r11 or S_Brand_P6M.r12 or S_Brand_P6M.r13 or S_Brand_P6M.r14 or S_Brand_P6M.r15 or S_Brand_P6M.r17 or S_Brand_P6M.r18 or S_Brand_P6M.r19 or S_Brand_P6M.r21)

radio.label: S_Brand_BUMO2
radio.title: And which one do you purchase most often in a grocery, supermarket, or retail store?

autofill.label: S_Brand_PastPurchased
autofill.title: Usage Past purchased (P3M) - User/Non User for Database
autofill.row: Test Brand User - all test brands netted

autofill.label: S_Brand_BUMO
autofill.title: BUMO - User/Non User for Database
autofill.row: Test Brand User - all test brands netted

radio.label: Agreement
radio.title:
Respondent Confidentiality Disclosure Agreement (RCDA)
Congratulations!
Thank you for agreeing to participate in this consumer study on behalf of Behaviorally. Before you can participate in this research, we would like you to understand that it will involve Confidential Information and you must agree to these terms and conditions. If you do not agree, you will not be eligible to participate in this study. By signing this agreement, you agree as follows:
You will use information or material disclosed to you or which may be available as part of this study only for the purpose of participating in this study, and you will not otherwise use the information or material for your own benefit or the benefit of any third party.
You agree to keep confidential and not disclose, copy, transmit, or use for any purpose other than your participation in this study any information or material disclosed or made available to you as part of the study, including about products or packaging that may be disclosed to you directly or indirectly by participating in this study. Any disclosure, copying, transmitting or misuse of any information or material in any form (including hard copy and/or electronic/data) whether intentional or unintentional may subject you to disqualification, and any other remedies available to Behaviorally or its study partners in law or equity.
You agree that Behaviorally (and its partners) will be irreparably harmed and monetary damages may not be adequate compensation if you fail to meet your obligations under this agreement, and that, in addition to other remedies, Behaviorally (or its partners) shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief to prevent any threatened or continued breach. The parties hereby waive any requirements for security for obtaining any provisional relief.
Each of Behaviorally’s partners is an intended third-party beneficiary of this agreement and each partner may enforce the terms of this agreement.
As further detailed in our privacy policy (https://www.behaviorally.com/privacy-policy), we take reasonable precautions to protect the privacy and security of your information during the market research survey. All information collected as part of this survey is treated in accordance with our online privacy policy and is destroyed 2 months after you have taken this survey. You will be compensated for your time, commitment, and confidential obligation.
Please confirm your acceptance of these terms by checking the agreement below.

row.label: r1
row.b: I hereby acknowledge and agree to the terms.

text.label: DateTime
text.title: DateTime
text.exec:
from datetime import datetime
cur_time = datetime.now() DateTime.val = cur_time.strftime("%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S")

block.label: DrawingExercise
block.builder:title: Drawing Exercise Practice
block.html:
During this interview, you will be asked to describe in your own words, as well as, draw different brands and types of products on your computer.
Please do not worry about artistic ability or accuracy. We are just interested in knowing what you remember about the packaging.
Below you can review a few examples of responses when asked to draw "Neutrogena Make Up Remover Wipes" packaging.
[pipe: EX1_IMGA][pipe: EX1_IMGB]
If you are ready to begin the interview, please click continue...
Please review the video above of an online response when asked to draw KRAFT MACARONI & CHEESE packaging.

textarea.label: D_Drawing_Practice1
textarea.title:
As mentioned, we will now ask you draw different types of products on your computer.
Please test and practice with the drawing tools in the drawing area below.
Please hover over all the tools before you begin.
From left to right: Undo; Redo; Clear All; Rectangle Shape; Elipse Shape; Line; Pencil Tool; Text Tool; Eraser; Fill Tool; Fill Color; Stroke Width; Stroke Color
You must select the color you wish to use before using each tool, shape, or adding text.
If you wish to restart, use the 'X' clear all option on the top right.
Using the tools and your mouse, you can begin drawing in the area below. You may take as little or as much time as you need.
When you are ready to begin the online drawing exercise, please click continue...

block.label: b1
block.builder:title: Clearasil Open End and Drawing Exercise

block.label: b4
block.builder:title: New Block
block.html:
You will now be asked to describe and then draw from memory the Softsoap body wash packaging you are most familiar with.
Please DO NOT look at the actual packaging when completing this exercise. We are just interested in knowing what you remember about the packaging. Do not worry about accuracy or artistic ability.

textarea.label: S1
textarea.title:
Please describe as best you can everything you remember about the Softsoap body wash you are most familiar with.
Please try to be as specific as possible by including name of product, colors, shapes, illustrations, symbols, type of lettering, as well as the material it is made of.

comment.strong: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

block.html:
Now as best as you can, please draw a picture of the Softsoap body wash you are most familiar with from your memory.
Please make your drawing as close as possible to Softsoap body wash packaging you are thinking of. Be as specific as you can and use any/all the tools, colors, shapes, lettering, symbols, illustrations, words and anything else you think is included on the Softsoap body wash packaging label.

textarea.label: S2_OE
textarea.title: If you would like to indicate or describe any part of your drawing, specific color or additional visual of your drawing, you can type any additional text below.

comment.strong: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

block.label: b5
block.builder:title: New Block
block.html:
You will now be asked to describe and then draw from memory the Dial body wash packaging you are most familiar with.
Please DO NOT look at the actual packaging when completing this exercise. We are just interested in knowing what you remember about the packaging. Do not worry about accuracy or artistic ability.

textarea.label: S3
textarea.title:
Please describe as best you can everything you remember about the Dial body wash you are most familiar with.
Please try to be as specific as possible by including name of product, colors, shapes, illustrations, symbols, type of lettering, as well as the material it is made of.

comment.strong: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

block.html:

Please make your drawing as close as possible to Dial body wash packaging you are thinking of. Be as specific as you can and use any/all the tools, colors, shapes, lettering, symbols, illustrations, words and anything else you think is included on the Dial body wash packaging label.

textarea.label: S4_OE
textarea.title: If you would like to indicate or describe any part of your drawing, specific color or additional visual of your drawing, you can type any additional text below.

comment.strong: Please be as detailed and thorough as possible.

Please try to be as specific as possible by including name of product, colors, shapes, illustrations, symbols, type of lettering, as well as the material it is made of.

strong.em: Now, just a few questions for classification purposes…

radio.label: C_Store
radio.title: Where do you typically buy Body Wash?
radio.row: At a physical store only (like a pharmacy, grocery store or mass merchandiser)
Mostly online and occasionally at a physical store
Mostly at a physical store and occasionally online
Both online and at a physical store equally

checkbox.label: C_Devices
checkbox.title: You mentioned you bought Body Wash online, what devices do you use to shop for Body Wash online?

checkbox.label: C_OnlineStores
checkbox.title: You mentioned you bought Body Wash online, where specifically?

checkbox.label: C_Delivery
checkbox.title: You mentioned you bought Body Wash online, how do you usually get the Body Wash product after you buy it?
checkbox.row: Buy online and pick up at the store
Buy online and get it delivered to my home
Buy online and get it delivered to my work
Buy online and get it delivered to a locker or place where I can pick it up

select.label: C_Employment
select.title: Which of the following best describes your current employment status?

select.label: STANDARD_EDUCATION
select.title: What is the highest level of education you have completed?
select.choice: Other post high school vocational training
Completed some college, but no degree
Completed some graduate, but no degree

select.label: STANDARD_Income
select.title: Please select the range that best represents your total annual household income.

select.label: STANDARD_Ethnicity
select.title: Please select one of these races/ethnicities that best describes you.
select.choice: Black, or African American, or Black British

select.label: STANDARD_HISPANIC
select.title: Are you of Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish origin?
select.choice: No, not of Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish origin
Yes, South American (e.g., Peru, Columbia, etc.)
Yes, North American (e.g., Mexican, Puerto Rican, Cuban, etc)
Yes, Central American (e.g., Panama, Costa Rica, Nicaragua, etc.)
